button.label: Flush This Region's Map Visibility Caches
button.label_selected: Flush This Region's Map Visibility Caches
button.name: Flush This Region's Map Visibility Caches

check_box.label: Prelude
check_box.name: check prelude
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to make the region a prelude

check_box.label: Fixed Sun
check_box.name: check fixed sun
check_box.tool_tip: Fix the sun position (like in Region/Estate > Terrain

check_box.label: Reset Home On Teleport
check_box.name: check reset home
check_box.tool_tip: When Resident teleports out, reset their home to the destination position.

check_box.label: Visible
check_box.name: check visible
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to make the region visible to non-gods

check_box.label: Damage
check_box.name: check damage
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to enable damage in this region

check_box.label: Block Traffic Tracking
check_box.name: block dwell
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to make the region not compute traffic

check_box.label: Block Terraform
check_box.name: block terraform
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to disallow people terraforming their land

check_box.label: Sandbox
check_box.name: is sandbox
check_box.tool_tip: Toggle whether this is a sandbox region

button.label: Bake Terrain
button.name: Bake Terrain
button.tool_tip: Save the current terrain as default

button.label: Revert Terrain
button.name: Revert Terrain
button.tool_tip: Replace the current terrain with default

line_editor.name: parentestate
line_editor.tool_tip: This is the parent estate for this region

line_editor.name: gridposx
line_editor.tool_tip: This is the grid x position for this region

line_editor.name: gridposy
line_editor.tool_tip: This is the grid y position for this region

button.label: Refresh
button.name: Refresh
button.tool_tip: Click here to refresh the above information

button.label: 套用
button.name: Apply
button.tool_tip: Click here to apply any changes from above

button.label: 選擇地區
button.name: Select Region
button.tool_tip: Select the whole region with the land tool

button.label: Autosave now
button.name: Autosave now
button.tool_tip: Save gzipped state to autosave directory

check_box.label: Disable Scripts
check_box.name: disable scripts
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to disable all scripts in this region

check_box.label: Disable Collisions
check_box.name: disable collisions
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to disable non-agent collisions in this region

check_box.label: Disable Physics
check_box.name: disable physics
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to disable all physics in this region

button.label: 套用
button.name: Apply
button.tool_tip: Click here to apply any changes from above

button.label: Set Target
button.name: Set Target
button.tool_tip: Set the target avatar for object deletion

button.label: Delete Target's Scripted Objects On Others Land
button.label_selected: Delete Target's Scripted Objects On Others Land
button.name: Delete Target's Scripted Objects On Others Land
button.tool_tip: Delete all scripted objects owned by the target on land not owned by the target. (no copy) objects will be returned.

button.label: Delete Target's Scripted Objects On *Any* Land
button.label_selected: Delete Target's Scripted Objects On *Any* Land
button.name: Delete Target's Scripted Objects On *Any* Land
button.tool_tip: Delete all scripted objects owned by the target in this region. (no copy) objects will be returned.

button.label: Delete *ALL* Of Target's Objects
button.name: Delete *ALL* Of Target's Objects
button.tool_tip: Delete all objects owned by the target in this region. (no copy) objects will be returned.

button.label: Get Top Colliders
button.name: Get Top Colliders
button.tool_tip: Gets list of objects experiencing the most narrowphase callbacks

button.label: Get Top Scripts
button.name: Get Top Scripts
button.tool_tip: Gets list of objects spending the most time running scripts

button.label: Scripts digest
button.name: Scripts digest
button.tool_tip: Gets a list of all scripts and number of occurences of each
